lines.text: Why did you set up all these traps around the house for?

[Showing Tracy how to oral pleasure someone]
See how you do it Tracy?
You know you don't have to swallow Cissy

[Taking her top off]
If they were anyone in there... would I do this?
I don't know if you'll like it though... it's right in the middle of nowhere.
You know what I feel about democracy... let alone campers!

[Hearing his girlfriend's death screams]
Hey, are you OK? Where are you? Come on out, I think we should go home now...
Rose are you putting me on?

[Trying to warn his daughter]
Those woods are dangerous

[Warning Robert]
By the way... there's alot of kids around here... if anything happens to them... I'm gonna hold you responsible.

[Ironic Lines]
I guarentee this'll be a weekend you never forget
